sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; function Work(props) { return (

Notable work and contributions

CodeSandbox

Leading a talented team of designers that shapes the next generation of web development tools.

Visit CodeSandbox

IBM iX

As Studio lead, I the ambitions of IBM and iX design Studios Benelux. I was overseeing a team—Building best-in-class digital experience for some of the world's biggest brands.

Visit IBM

Smart Ready to

I worked with IBM, Daimler, and Computer Rock on the smart ready to platform and apps. Ready to plays a crucial part role in Smart's future vision.

Download App

Catawiki

Led the design of Catawiki's mobile platform. And worked on the Redesign of the main application catawiki.com

Download the apps

Albelli

Led the design of Albelli's is a mobile app. With the Albelli photo book app for your smartphone, you can quickly and intuitively create your photo book.

Download the apps

Lifelines

Designed and Developed the web application LifeLines, a data visualization for the LifeLines study. A study into heritability and the environment affect the health of a human being. username: Lifelines psw: Maaktonderzoekmogelijk.

Explore the app

Tango Demasque

Edited and co-Produced the award-winning Tango Démasqué commercial commissioned by the Philips business-unit up-market flat TV a commercial to demonstrate the range of possibilities of the Philips Aurea Ambilight series.

Watch the video

Perfect Pixel HD Engine

Edited and post-production for the Perfect Pixel HD Engine. Announcement video commissioned by the Philips business unit.

Watch the video
); } export default Work;
